00009     ShuttingDown = 3,
00010     Unloading = 4,
00011     Uninitialized = 5,
00012     Unknown = -1

00029     [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]
00030     public class GpsDeviceState
00031     {
00032         public static int GpsMaxFriendlyName = 64;
00033         public static int GpsDeviceStructureSize = 216;
00034 
00035         int serviceState = 0;
00039         public GpsServiceState ServiceState
00040         {
00041             get {return (GpsServiceState)serviceState;}
00042         }
00043 
00044         int deviceState = 0;
00048         public GpsServiceState DeviceState
00049         {
00050             get {return (GpsServiceState)deviceState;}
00051         }
00052 
00053         string friendlyName = "";
00057         public string FriendlyName
00058         {
00059             get {return friendlyName;}
00060         }
00061 
00068         public GpsDeviceState(IntPtr pGpsDevice)
00069         {
00070             // make sure our pointer is valid
00071             if (pGpsDevice == IntPtr.Zero)
00072             {
00073                 throw new ArgumentException();
00074             }
00075 
00076             // read in the service state which starts at offset 8
00077             serviceState = Marshal.ReadInt32(pGpsDevice, 8);
00078             // read in the device state which starts at offset 12
00079             deviceState = Marshal.ReadInt32(pGpsDevice, 12);
00080 
00081             // the friendly name starts at offset 88
00082             IntPtr pFriendlyName = (IntPtr)(pGpsDevice.ToInt32() + 88);
00083             // marshal the native string into our gpsFriendlyName
00084             friendlyName = Marshal.PtrToStringUni(pFriendlyName);
00085         }
00086     }
00087 }
